Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_FILE_TYPE

The basic type MILES_FILE_TYPE describes the type of a file.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AILFILETYPE_UNKNOWN File isn't one of the supported types. (Debugger value: 0).
 AILFILETYPE_PCM_WAV Standard PCM wave file. (Debugger value: 1).
 AILFILETYPE_ADPCM_WAV IMA ADPCM compressed wave file. (Debugger value: 2).
 AILFILETYPE_OTHER_WAV Unsupported compressed wave file. (Debugger value: 3).
 AILFILETYPE_OTHER_ASI_WAV Compressed wave file that is handled by an unspecified ASI decoder. (Debugger value: 14).
 AILFILETYPE_VOC Creative VOC digital sound file. (Debugger value: 4).
 AILFILETYPE_MIDI Standard MIDI file. (Debugger value: 5).
 AILFILETYPE_XMIDI XMIDI file. (Debugger value: 6).
 AILFILETYPE_XMIDI_DLS XMIDI file containing embedded, uncompressed DLS data. (Debugger value: 7).
 AILFILETYPE_XMIDI_MLS XMIDI file containing embedded, compressed DLS data. (Debugger value: 8).
 AILFILETYPE_DLS Uncompressed DLS file. (Debugger value: 9).
 AILFILETYPE_MLS Compressed DLS file. (Debugger value: 10).
 AILFILETYPE_MPEG_L1_AUDIO Compressed MPEG Layer 1 file (which MSS cannot play). (Debugger value: 11).
 AILFILETYPE_MPEG_L2_AUDIO Compressed MPEG Layer 2 file (which MSS cannot play). (Debugger value: 12).
 AILFILETYPE_MPEG_L3_AUDIO Compressed MPEG Layer 3 file. (Debugger value: 13).


Group: Utility Services
Related Functions: AIL_file_type
